wikipedia_page.main: Edgar W. Dawson (10 October 1931 – 28 June 2015) was an English professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1950s and 1960s. He played at representative level for Great Britain and English League XIII, and at club level for Clarence Working Men's Club ARLFC (Clarence Street, York), and York, as a loose forward, i.e. number 13, during the era of contested scrums.

response: * Edgar Dawson won caps for Great Britain while at York in 1956 1-cap
